name: Grass Demo
description:
A little tech demo for a grass shader in Untiy.

Get the Unity source here: http://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/izvov6sv3rlr7ln/GrassDemo_Source.zip?dl=0

Controls:

  • WASD - move
  • Mouse - look around
  • Mousewheel - adjust draw distance

Feel free to use/modify this shader for your own projects.

Rock and grass textures courtesy of João Paulo: https://3dtextures.me/

Heightmap via https://imgur.com/gallery/EyCkvNy
